name: Silverblade
overview: The year is 2076 and the world is ruled by evil aliens...however there are still rebels and you are one of them. All plans are made in a secret hideout which one day gets found by the police. You know that they will be there soon, but there is just one chance of escape. As you look at that chance you smile...it is a very old ship called: Silverblade. A PD shooter by Mirrorman, released in 1992.
